name: Adventures in Caledorn
description:
Adventures in Caledorn

Journey into the mountainous town of Caledorn. Protect the towns people from threats in the wilderness as you search for treasure and reward. Upgrade you equipment to become the strongest warrior.

Gather coins to purchase new weapons. There are 3 different weapons types and 2 offhands. All items are randomly generated with different stats.

Adventure into the randomly generated wilderness. Encounter monsters and small biomes. Search for chests and then head back to caledorn to spend your earnings.
